00060         {
00061             svcRTN result = SAL__NOT_DEFINED;
00062             switch (topicnumber) {
00063             
00064             case SAL_SID_TopicId :
00065                 salTopic = (TopicId *)new TopicId();

00067                 break;
00068

00070                 salTopic = (OtherId *)new OtherId();
00071                 result = SAL__OK;
00072                 break;
00073

00075             return result;
